typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		country as string,
		indicator as string,
		date as string,
		year_week as string,
		value as integer,
		source as string,
		url as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> dailyHospitalAdmission
source(output(
		country as string,
		country_code_2_digit as string,
		country_code_3_digit as string,
		continent as string,
		population as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> sourcelookucountry
source(output(
		date_key as string,
		date as string,
		year as string,
		month as string,
		day as string,
		day_name as string,
		day_of_year as string,
		week_of_month as string,
		week_of_year as string,
		month_name as string,
		year_month as string,
		year_week as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> sourceDimDate
dailyHospitalAdmission select(mapColumn(
		country,
		indicator,
		source,
		value,
		each(match(name=='date'),
			'reported_'+$$ = $$),
		each(match(name=='year_week'),
			'reported_'+$$ = $$)
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectReqColumns
SelectReqColumns, sourcelookucountry lookup(SelectReqColumns@country == sourcelookucountry@country,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
Lookup1 select(mapColumn(
		country = SelectReqColumns@country,
		country_code_2_digit,
		country_code_3_digit,
		indicator,
		source,
		reported_date,
		value,
		reported_year_week,
		population
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectFields
SelectFields split(like(indicator,'Daily%'),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(Daily, Weekly)
sourceDimDate derive(ecdc_year_week = year + '-W' + lpad(week_of_year, 2, '0')) ~> DerivedECDCYearWeek
DerivedECDCYearWeek aggregate(groupBy(ecdc_year_week),
	start_date = min(date),
		end_date = max(date)) ~> AggDimDate
ConditionalSplit1@Weekly, AggDimDate join(reported_year_week == ecdc_year_week,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinWeeklyDimDate
ConditionalSplit1@Daily, AggDimDate join(reported_year_week == ecdc_year_week,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinDailyDimDate
JoinWeeklyDimDate pivot(groupBy(country,
		country_code_2_digit,
		country_code_3_digit,
		source,
		reported_date,
		value,
		reported_year_week,
		population,
		ecdc_year_week,
		start_date,
		end_date),
	pivotBy(indicator, ['Weekly new ICU admissions per 100k', 'Weekly new hospital admissions per 100k']),
	count = sum(value),
	columnNaming: '$N_$V',
	lateral: true) ~> PivotWeekly
PivotWeekly sort(asc(ecdc_year_week, true)) ~> SortWeekly
JoinDailyDimDate pivot(groupBy(country,
		country_code_2_digit,
		country_code_3_digit,
		source,
		reported_date,
		reported_year_week,
		population,
		start_date,
		end_date),
	pivotBy(indicator),
	count = sum(value),
	columnNaming: '$N_$V',
	lateral: true) ~> PivotDaily
PivotDaily sort(asc(reported_year_week, true)) ~> SortDaily
SortWeekly sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['weekly_hospital_admission.csv'],
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		country,
		country_code_2_digit,
		country_code_3_digit,
		start_date,
		end_date,
		source,
		reported_date,
		reported_year_week,
		population
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sinkWeekly
SortDaily sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['daily_hospital_admission.csv'],
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sinkDaily
